a1: The tool supports HEX, RGB, HSL, and CSS rgba() formats. All values update in real-time as you pick a color.
q2: Can I enter a specific HEX code?
a2: Yes, you can type a HEX code directly in the input field and all other formats will update automatically.
a3: Yes, the color picker is fully responsive and works on mobile devices with touch-friendly controls.
